name: CUSTOM Video with text #1

desktop_image_width.label: Width
desktop_image_width.description: Media is automatically optimized for mobile.

layout.label: Media position
layout.description: Media first is the default mobile layout.

video_url.label: Video embed from URL
video_url.description: Youtube or Vimeo. Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

poster.label: Poster
poster.description: If autoplay is enabled the poster will be hidden

video_controls.label: Show controls on video from Shopify
video_controls.description: If autoplay is enabled the controls will be hidden

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
